title: Aleksandr Kogan creates 'This Is Your Digital Life' Facebook app; data later used by Cambridge Analytica
summary:
Cambridge University researcher Aleksandr Kogan developed a personality-quiz
app that collected data via Facebook's API and shared it with Cambridge
Analytica. Regulators later documented deceptive practices; Facebook estimated
up to ~87 million users were affected.

sources.title: UK Parliament DCMS—'Disinformation and fake news' (evidence)
FTC administrative complaint—Cambridge Analytica, Nix & Kogan
Hard Questions—Russian Ads Delivered to Congress (platform context)

notes:
